name: A Verdant Hue
description: A single screen, farming game, as an orphan who's survived recent attacks and is determined to bring back some life to his family farm.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The game is a bit buggy, and after a while the appeal wears off, but I can't rag on it too much because I've been playing for a pretty substantial amount of time and the game was made for a good cause. After a few in-game days, my shovel glitched out and now I can't use it because it is 'locked', so I can't clear the whole lot, but I was able to work around it. Like I said, though, the game is still pretty fun so I'd say if you are looking for a way to spend some spare time why not check this out?
